title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate solution for hearing protection at the shooting range. These earmuffs feature dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers that provide unparalleled sound quality, allowing you to experience every detail of your surroundings.

With a sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds and independent volume controls, you can customize your listening experience to suit your preferences. The noise reduction rating of 23 dB ensures that harmful sounds are significantly reduced, while still allowing you to hear important audio cues.

Equipped with 2 omnidirectional microphones, these earmuffs capture sound from all directions, providing excellent situational awareness. The audio input jack allows you to connect your favorite devices, so you can enjoy your favorite music or podcasts while staying protected.

The recessed volume control knobs offer convenient and precise adjustments, ensuring optimal volume levels at all times. The earmuffs come with 2 AAA batteries included, providing long-lasting power.

Measuring at 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing just 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are lightweight and portable, making them perfect for extended shooting sessions. The comfortable metal wire frame headband ensures a secure and comfortable fit, while the foldable design allows for easy storage when not in use.

Constructed with a composite housing for sound dampening, these earmuffs provide superior protection in noisy environments. Don't compromise on your hearing safety, choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs for the ultimate shooting experience.

Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs - the ultimate hearing protection for your shooting range experience! 

Featuring dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers, these earmuffs deliver crystal-clear sound quality, allowing you to stay fully aware of your surroundings. With a remarkable sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds and independent volume controls, you can customize your listening experience to perfection. 

Boasting a noise reduction rating of 23 dB and equipped with two omnidirectional microphones, these earmuffs provide exceptional noise reduction while still allowing you to hear important sounds and conversations. The built-in audio input jack allows you to connect to your favorite devices for an enhanced audio experience. 

The recessed volume control knobs ensure easy and precise adjustments, giving you complete control over the volume. Plus, with the included 2 AAA batteries, you'll never have to worry about running out of power. 

Measuring at 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing just 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are lightweight and compact, making them easy to carry and store. The comfortable metal wire frame headband ensures a secure and comfortable fit, while the foldable design allows for convenient storage. 

Crafted with a composite housing for superior sound dampening, these earmuffs provide excellent protection against loud noises, ensuring your hearing is safeguarded. 

Upgrade your shooting range experience with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs - the perfect combination of comfort, functionality, and style. Get yours today and elevate your shooting experience to new heights!

With a compact size of 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing just 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are lightweight and portable, making them the perfect companion for your shooting adventures.

Designed for comfort, the earmuffs feature a comfortable metal wire frame headband that can be easily adjusted to fit any head size. Plus, they are foldable, allowing for easy storage and transportation.

Constructed with a composite housing for sound dampening, these earmuffs not only provide exceptional protection but also deliver superior sound quality. 

Invest in the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs today and elevate your shooting range experience to new heights. Don't compromise on your hearing protection, choose the best.
